Description_lang: A hammer slowly falls from the sky upon the target, after $d, they suffer $s2% of the damage taken from your abilities as Holy damage during that time.$?s406158 [|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $406158s1 Holy Power.][]
AuraDescription_lang: Sentenced to suffer $s2% of the damage your abilities deal during its duration as Holy damage.

description_blz.en_US: A hammer slowly falls from the sky upon the target, after 8 sec, they suffer 20% of the damage taken from your abilities as Holy damage during that time.
description_blz.es_MX: Un martillo cae lentamente del cielo sobre el objetivo. Después de 8 s, recibe un 20% del daño que recibió de tus habilidades en ese tiempo como daño sagrado.
description_blz.pt_BR: Um martelo cai do céu lentamente sobre o alvo. Após 8 s, o alvo recebe o equivalente a 20% do dano causado pelas suas habilidades durante esse período como dano Sagrado.
description_blz.de_DE: Ein Hammer fällt langsam vom Himmel auf das Ziel. Nach 8 Sek. erleidet es 20% des in dieser Zeit durch Eure Fähigkeiten erlittenen Heiligschadens.
description_blz.en_GB: A hammer slowly falls from the sky upon the target, after 8 sec, they suffer 20% of the damage taken from your abilities as Holy damage during that time.
description_blz.es_ES: Un martillo cae lentamente del cielo sobre el objetivo. Tras 8 s, este recibe un 20% del daño que le hayan infligido tus facultades en ese tiempo como daño Sagrado.
description_blz.fr_FR: Un marteau tombe lentement du ciel sur la cible. Au bout de 8 s, elle subit 20% des dégâts que lui ont infligés vos techniques pendant ce laps de temps sous forme de dégâts du sacré.]
description_blz.it_IT: Un martello scende lentamente dal cielo sul bersaglio. Dopo 8 s, il bersaglio subisce danni da sacro pari al 20% dei danni subiti dalle tue abilità in quel lasso di tempo.
description_blz.ru_RU: С неба на цель медленно падает молот. Через 8 сек. цель получает урон от светлой магии, равный 20% урона, нанесенного за это время вашими способностями.
description_blz.ko_KR: 하늘에서 대상에게 망치가 천천히 떨어집니다. 8초 후에 대상은 그 시간 동안 시전자의 능력으로 입히는 신성 피해의 20%에 해당하는 피해를 받습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 一把錘子緩慢從天而降，砸向目標，在8秒後，對其造成相當於這段時間內你技能傷害20%的神聖傷害。
description_blz.zh_CN: 一把战锤缓缓从天而降至目标身上。目标在8秒后会受到神圣伤害，数值相当于在此期间从你的技能受到的伤害的20%。
